title: Does having an expensive skin
body:
Make you a target for verbal abuse and in game harassment? 

I notice when I don't say anything while playing a champ with no skin, i usually get honors. 

When I have an expensive skin on though, it's always omg refund haha scrubbbbb every time i make the slightest slip up. And enemies start focusing me more even when its not appropriate. 

It's like there's a lot of really poor people playing this game that get so mad when someone has an expensive skin lol.
